name: REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON
description: The reason for the remote audio state change.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_INTERNAL: 0: The SDK reports this reason when the audio state changes.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_LOCAL_MUTED: 3: The local user stops receiving the remote audio stream or disables the audio module.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_LOCAL_UNMUTED: 4: The local user resumes receiving the remote audio stream or enables the audio module.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_MUTED: 5: The remote user stops sending the audio stream or disables the audio module.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_UNMUTED: 6: The remote user resumes sending the audio stream or enables the audio module.

parameters.REMOTE_AUDIO_STATE_REASON_REMOTE_OFFLINE: 7: The remote user leaves the channel.
